Name: Apicurio
Text: Alright, here we go again...avast, you magical criminal!

Name: Hillbeetle
Text: Oh, you want some more, do you? You'll never get in the way of true love!

Name: Apicurio
Text: The only 'true' thing about what you're doing is how [shake]truly unnartural[/shake] it is.

Name: Hillbeetle
Text: I'll hear no more of this! [[shake][color=red]Git!!
